Conversation.value: The fire hoses you got me were perfect! Thanks again, I really appreciate all the hard work you've done for the town and myself. I was able to obtain some old fire trucks but we need to paint them to make them stand out. Can you help me?
Thanks again, I need you to get me 10 cans of red paint. When you get back I'll give you something for your troubles
I need you to get me 10 cans of red paint. I don't care how, just come back when your done and I'll pay you for your services.
Do you live under power lines? Get me 10 cans of red paint and don't come back till you got em....
